name: Manta Style
description: An axe made of reflective materials that causes confusion amongst enemy ranks.

abilities.name: Mirror Image
abilities.description: Creates multiple mirrored illusions of the wielder that deals a portion of the wielder's damage and receives additional incoming damage.
notes: The wielder is hidden upon cast; this disjoints incoming projectiles
Issues the wielder a stop-command, canceling all queued orders, including orders to player-controlled units
Applies a basic dispel on the wielder
Creates the illusions based on the ability's cast position
Grants 400-radius flying vision centered around caster during split time
The wielder and created illusions reappear in random positions within fixed formations
Recasting the ability replaces all Mirror Image-based illusions of the current instance

additionalInfo: For Yasha-based items: Multiple sources of movement speed do not stack
For Yasha-based items: Multiple sources of attack speed fully stack
